10056000.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「剣岩には は:
Sword Rock is said to enshrine the fighters who lost their lives during daring battles in the Old Orseco Arena long ago.
So it is said that the greatsword dedicated there contains the fierce fighters' fighting spirit.
Many rub the greatsword to pray for victory, and even take some of its rust as a good luck charm.

48775.「ん？ マグナスさまの犬を 探しているって？\n あの白い犬なら ここから外に出:
Hmm? You're looking for Mr. Magnus' dog? That
white dog just walked out of here. Zubo was in
hot pursuit.

112713.「タランラ タランラ～♪ タンタンタン～♪\n あら。わたしに ご用かしら？\n:
Tra-la～♪ Tra-la～♪ Tra-la-la～♪
Ah, Do you have business with me? Sorry, but if you want to talk shop, you'll have to go through the office, y'know ♪

112714.「ん？ ラスタの 行き先を知らないか……？\n 失礼だけど どなた様かしら？\n:
Huh? Do I know Rasta's whereabouts...? I don't mean to be rude, but who are you?
Aah, the dancer from the legendary old man's place ♪ Rasta's junior, right～♪ I haven't seen them today, but what happened?
Did Rasta go to see her old man? No way～♪ Don't underestimate the girl's lack of feminine power～♪
Who is said to be a clinging mirror of the unpopular... except for her dancing. On her days off, she sleeps until the evening. Making a man out of her is just a dream come true～♪
Anyway, she's probably off to visit her ancestors' tomb again.～♪ It may surprise you, but they're surprisingly reliable～♪
If I remeber correctly, to the southeast of Gartlant Territory is where their ancestors' tomb is, I think I heard～♪
I don't know for sure, but do your best～♪ Tra-la～♪ Tra-la～♪ Tra-la-la～♪

112715.「それとも 私の踊りが お気に召したのかしら？\n うれしいわ～。いくらでも見て:
Or was it my dancing you liked, I wonder? I'm so happy～ You can watch me as much as you like～♪
Tra-la～♪ Tra-la～♪ Tra-la-la～♪

112716.彼女が ラスターシャの友人のようだ。\nラスターシャのことを 聞きますか？<ye:
It seems like HER is a friend of Rastasha's.
Do you want to ask about Rastasha?<yesno><close>

112717.「たしか ガートラント領の 南東の方に \n あの子のご先祖様の お墓があるって:
I think I heard that her ancestors have a tomb in the southeast of Gartlant Territory. I don't really know, but good luck~~ Tarangla
Tarangla~~ Tan Tan Tan~~~

112718.「タランラ タランラ～♪ タンタンタン～♪\n あら あなたは。ごきげんよう。\:
I wonder how Rasta is doing? You know? I heard there's been an increase in cases of dancers being attacked by ghosts lately. I
wonder what's going on. Well, don't go out alone too much. You and Rasta, be careful. Tarang la, tarang la, tan tan tan tan tan tan
tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan

112753.「タランラ タランラ～♪ タンタンタン～♪\n あら あなたは。ごきげんよう。\:
I hope Rasta is doing well. I just met her recently, though! I was so surprised to see you so full of enthusiasm, as if you've
changed! You always say you're going to start getting serious tomorrow, but tomorrow has finally arrived! I can't lose either! Tell
them I'm looking forward to the next stage. Tarang la, tarang la, tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan tan

185969.なんのヘンテツもない\nただの 井戸のようだ……。:
It seems to be just well without any kind of
hentai.

34611.「昔は この国も オーガたるもの強く生きよ！\n ってな感じで みんなが みんな:
In the past, Ogres in the country lived for strength! There was a time when everyone felt that and were devoting themselves to trainiing.
But nowadays, that's old-fashioned. Just because one's an Ogre doesn't mean they should have to train! For me, who hates asceticism, this is paradise.

34612.「お父さんが 帰ってこないんだ……。\n でも お城には スピンドル兵士長ってい:
Father didn't come back... But there's a very reliable
man in the castle named Captain Spindle, they say. So
I'm sure he'll be able to do something about father!

34614.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ピュージュさん:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Pyuju-san, a minstrel, loves kids. They always
come from somewhere and show us magic tricks
in this plaza.

34615.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「あの温厚な グレン:
King Bagudo of Glen Castle has suddenly declared war on this country! Here in Gartlant, reliable soldiers are disappearing
one after another! What should we do?

34616.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「グレン城のバグド王:
Since Glen Castle's King Bagudo's declaration of war, I wondered what would happen. Now, with the country's soldiers missing, it's a terrible situation, isn't it.
Now that the declaration of war's been rescinded, we don't have to worry about war, but... The soldiers' whereabouts are still unknown.

34617.「スピンドル兵士長が ガートラント城に来たのは\n もう ２０年も前のことかねえ:
It's already been around 20 years since Captain Spindle came to Gartlant Castle, hasn't it.
With his fleeting figure and splendid swordsmanship, in those days, Captain Spindle grabbed hold of everyone's hearts.

34618.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ピエロのお兄ち:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I wonder if big bro clown is here yet. I wonder what
he'll show us today. I'm excited...

34619.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「この国は 最強の兵:
This country is protected by two pillars: the strongest soldiers and the paladin troops serving the royal family.
But even those brave warriors managed to wind up in the mysterious scandal and disappeared... Oh, someone please do something!

34620.「この辺りでは ウデの立つ者たちが\n 突然 行方知れずになるという事件が\n:
Around here, skilled people have been going missing in a so-called scandal.
If you have Proof of Adulthood, then you can hear more details at the castle, but... Just recently, the atmosphere in the castle has been very tense lately.
I'd recommend that you visit the castle another time.

34621.「この辺りでは ウデの立つ者たちが\n 突然 行方知れずになるという事件が\n:
Around here, skilled people have been going missing in a so-called scandal.
Even Gartlant Castle's soldiers that have gone to search haven't returned, I hear...
If you want to hear more details, then you should go to the end of this road, to Gartlant Castle.

34622.「賢者マリーンさまが いてくださって\n 本当に よかった。\n<br>\n「魔:
I'm truly happy that Sage Malynn is here for us.
After being wounded by a monster, my husband won't be able to return to being a soldier, but... Just having his life saved is enough.

34623.「鉄道を使わなくても\n このオーグリード大陸だけなら\n どこまでも 歩いてい:
You can walk anywhere in the Ogreed Continent without using the railroads. But if you want to cross to another continent inhabited by
other races, you need a Rail Pass.

34624.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「この前 宿屋で:
The other day at the inn, I met an amazing person! Rangao Village's Martial Arts reigning Champion for the past 5 years, Jiganf!
But... He seemed to have disappeared suddenly, worrying the innkeeper. Hopefully he wasn't caught up in the you-know-what scandal, she said.

34625.「ここは オーグリード大陸 最大の都\n ガートラント城下町。\n この通りの先:
This is Ogreed's largest capital, Gartlant Castletown. At the end of this road, Gartlant Castle can be seen.
Our country's dominions are the adjacent Gartlant Territory, Gilzad Region to the south, and Orseco Highlands to the northwest, where tough monsters live.
But you will be safe inside the town. Take your time and have a good rest.

34626.「父親の行方が わからなくなってから\n 息子は ずっと ふさぎこんでいました。:
Ever since his father's disappearance, my son
has been depressed. It is thanks to Pyuju that he is
now able to smile.

34627.「このガートラントの王 グロスナーさまは\n 時折 北のグレン城に 友好の証とし:
Gartlant's King, Grossner, occasionally sends gifts up north to Glen Castle as a token of friendship, they say.
Even last month, the royal family joined the paladin troop formed a convoy and left for Glen Castle.

34628.「ここは ガートラント城。\n ふところ深き グロスナー王は この城を\n すべ:
This is Gartlant Castle. The stronghearted King
Grossner has opened his castle to all.

34629.「ウデに覚えのある者にとっちゃ この国の兵士や\n 精鋭のパラディン部隊は あこ:
For those of us who are good at what we do, a soldier or elite paladin of this country is what we aspire to be, y'know.
Strong people around the world even come to volunteer. But recently, only weak-looking ones have shown up... It sucks.

34630.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「ああ キンチョーし:
Aah, I'm stressed. I've always wanted to be a soldier of Gartlant.
Uugh... It's impossible for me. I said I'd become a soldier, no matter what, so there's no turning back now... Mom, watch over me, ok.

34631.「オイラ 知らなかったけどよう。\n すんげえ いやしの術を使うって 有名な\n:
Y'all didn't know, but how wouldja. They say that Sage Malynn, famous fer her amazin' healing magic, is coming to the country!
She's able to heal any sick or injured person, y'know. She's staying in Gartlant Castle at King Grossner's request, they say.

34632.「私が 魔物たちに追いつめられていた時\n 通りかかった 賢者マリーンどのが\n:
When I was being cornered by monsters, Sage Malynn happened to pass by and rescued me by dealing with the monsters.
Lady Malynn is famous for her healing arts, but her martial arts are exceptional too, I tell you.

34633.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「いいねえ ピュ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>It's great, ain't it, Pyuju's performance that is!
Even after it's over, I'm still in high spirits.

34634.「この国は どうなってしまうんじゃろうと\n 悩んでいたのが ウソのようじゃ。\:
It feels hard-to-believe that that I was worried about
what would happen to the country. To put me in this
cheerful a mood, Pyuju's a true first-class comedian!

34635.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ピエロのお兄ち:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I'll always treasure the puppet that my clown brother
gave me!

34636.「アロルドさんでしたら もう出発しましたよ。\n グロスナー王から じきじきに\:
If you're after Arold, he's already left. King Grossner personally entrusted him with the missing persons' case, you see.
Together with his fiancé, Maiyu, they are headed north to Zama Beacon.

34637.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「さっき 思いつ:
A short while ago, a tormented looking Maiyu returned on her own... You don't think something happened to Arold?
She went straight to the castle. Please, you all should go to her too!

34638.「行方不明事件を解決するため いよいよ\n スピンドル兵士長が 出動なさったよう:
Looks like Captain Spindle has finally been dispatched to solve the missing persons' case, you see. You must be his subordinate, , right?
He asked me to explain to you the location of the abandoned house where the mastermind is lurking. The Captain really is very caring person, right!
If you follow the road southeast through Gartlant Territory, you'll reach Gilzad Region. Just follow the map to Pirate's Hideout and you're there!

34639.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「スピンドル兵士:
Captain Spindle returned in very high spirits. At the abandoned house, he defeated the criminal responsible for the missing persons' case, I hear!
Go on, , hurry to the castle! You mustn't keep your superior, the Captain, waiting!

34640.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「輸送団の人たちが:
All the members of the transport team have returned, right. But there's no sign of the others who are still missing returning.
Now you're headed for the Old Orseco Arena...? Is there another problem still unresolved?
Old Orseco Arena is northwest of Gartlant Territory, straight west through the Orseco Highlands until you see some old ruins.
It's a haven for monsters, I hear... If you're going, take care!

34641.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「お父さんが 帰:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Daddy came home! He hugged me a lot and patted
my head! All this because of Captain Spindle,
right?

34642.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「スピンドル兵士:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Captain Spindle came back with the soldiers and
paladins in formation! Wow, what a splendid sight to
behold...!

34644.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「<pc>さん！:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><pc>! The missing people have returned!
You freed them, didn't you? Go on, everyone's waiting
for you. Please hurry to Gartlant Castle!

34645.「夫は すこし疲れた様子でしたが\n 無事な姿を見せてくれました。\n 本当に:
My husband looked a little worn-out, but he turned
up safe and sound. I was truly relieved...

34646.「今じゃ こうして のんびり暮らしてますがね。\n このガートラントでも オーガ:
Nowadays, I am living a leisurely life like this. I heard that even here in Gartlant, there was an activity to train people strictly
to live like an Ogre. I think it was around that time. Prince Deltanis, son of King Grossner, died in an accident.

34647.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「そういえば 旅:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>Speaking of which, what happened to Pyuju from
minstrel? It's about time he came.

34648.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よく わからん:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I don't know for sure, but it looks like the missing
persons case has been solved. That's good, I'm glad!

34649.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「事件が解決して:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I'm so glad that the case was solved! Peace is
the best, after all!

34650.「話は 聞きましたわ。\n 賢者マリーンは 私兵団を作るために\n 強い者たちを:
I've heard the stories. Sage Malynn was a monster who captured the strong to create a private army! He must have gained King
Grossner's trust and entered the castle in order to quickly find the strong men who were gathering in this country.

34651.「マリーンが 夫を魔物から救ってくれたのですが\n その時のケガがもとで 夫は:
Malynn saved my husband from being a monster, but because of the injuries he sustained, he will never be a soldier again. I heard that
Sage Malynn was a monster. I wonder if the treatment she gave my husband at that time was really the right thing to do. I can't stop
thinking about that. I used to be so grateful that he saved my life.

34652.「ランガーオ村の 武闘大会チャンピオン\n ジーガンフさんも 無事に 帰ってきた:
Jiganf, the Rangao Village martial arts tournament champion, returned safely. The innkeeper's housekeeper was relieved. She said
that Jiganf was on a training trip to defeat a legendary demon, so he left immediately.

34653.「このガートラントの王 グロスナーさまは\n 時折 北のグレン城に 友好の証とし:
Grossner, the king of Gartlant, sometimes gives gifts to Glen Castle in the north as a token of friendship. Even though Gartlant's
castle is much larger and has more soldiers! I guess Grossner wants the Ogres to get along with each other.

34654.「ウデに覚えのある者にとっちゃ この国の兵士や\n 精鋭のパラディン部隊は あこ:
For those of us who are good at what we do, a soldier or elite paladin of this country is what we aspire to be, y'know.
Strong people around the world even come to volunteer. ...But strength isn't everything, they say; recently, I seem to have realized.
There's cute guys too, like that one over there, right.

34655.「賢者マリーンが使う いやしの術は\n 病人もケガ人も たちまち 元気にしたんだ:
Sage Malynn's healing arts made sick and injured people well again in no time! I thought he was a monster, but I never thought
he was a monster.

34656.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「あの賢者マリー:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Is it true that Sage Malynn was a monster? I
know it was an act of trust, but without
Malynn, I wouldn't be alive today.

120308.「タランラ タランラ～♪ タンタンタン～♪\n あら。わたしに ご用かしら？\n:
Tra-la～♪ Tra-la～♪ Tra-la-la～♪
Ah, Do you have business with me? Sorry, but if you want to talk shop, you'll have to go through the office, y'know ♪
Or was it my dancing you liked, I wonder? I'm so happy～ You can watch me as much as you like～♪
Tra-la～♪ Tra-la～♪ Tra-la-la～♪
